this whole entry is dedicated to isaac:


Isaac ___(he doesn't even know)___ Budmen is the most awesomest person in the whole world!!! this kid is so rad! isaac is cool. issac is awesome. isaac is rad. he's is the coolest kid on the face of the earth..(woah!) seriously, everyone adores isaac. and if you don't, you should!!!! dude i had so much fun at the spaghetti dinner. thot it was gonna suck! i had a ton of fun w/ you, you are the most awesome kid in the world mann!! and thank you for that whipping that i will have a bruise from... haha using that awesome dish cleaner water squirter thingy majigy i'll cherish your name tag forever =P hahah, it'll be on my planner til the end of eternity....lmao...love ya sweets

...and you can't forget that oh so sexy outfit he was sporting tonite lol!!! i sound all fashion consulatant sounding-ish....that humors me 



-the one who wishes to be isaac =P (and got to wear his almighty name tag)     heck yes!

goin to the mall w/ katie...i haven't chilled w/ her in like forever lol then i went to church, after mass was the spaghetti dinner (who'd eat that)? but neways, me and about every other confirmation kid at our church was there...

write back lata...

wow...haven't written in a while...semi was fun...school today = hilarious...
 
 me and linds got pizza dilivered for food day during math...everytime jason saw us..."PIZZA!!!" lmao! haha...it sucks tho b/c i'm wicked sick, but oh well. going to the mall tomorrow w/ katie..we're seeing 'hitch' which looks pretty funny...i dunno what else is planned but i'm sure something..lindsey's in hammond =( so i won't see her at all...tonite i'm gettin a new fone but i think i'm keepin the same number...and monday's valentine's day =) frankly i think it's just a commercial holiday, i mean really there's not much point in it, i suppose... oh btw..i got 2 new s/n's for AIM...well i'm peacin out but here are some awesome lyrics everyone should read:

"Bleeding Hearts Shed No Tears"
-Atreyu ((aka awesome band!!))

After all that has transpired
After all thats taken place
After all the stab wounds
And just just before my death
I rise phoenix like a new
From the still burning ashes
Of false hearts lies
To fly once again
To shine from within

Dismember my self
Sever my veins
Poison myself
A heartless joke
Slash at my neck
Gouge out my eyes
Screaming in agony
You pacify me.

Bleeding hearts shed no tears.

Soaked all the way through with remorse and regret
Fire to purify my soul and blood to replenish it
I search in hopes of completion to justify my love for you
Nothing ever ends where our souls begin

Nothing can save me from myself
You keep me safe
Resurrecting my love
An angel like you
Can never fall
Heaven i found
Right in my arms

I found love in you
I find truth in you
I see light in you
And it horrifies me

jesse<3 .: jackster :.

jesse<3

woah it's been like forever since i updated!! nothing's really happened that much i guess, today me and jesse went to the mall for a bit..when i got home matzi reminded me that it's myne and jesse's 2 week!! yay! next weekend is semi!! but i've got bandfest from 12:30p til 4:30p and then semi starts at 6p til midnite...well that's all for now my cookies are done! woohoo! i made choc. chip, white choc. macadamia nut, and oatmeal raisin..lol


p.s.-- goin to the papa roch concert on march 19th in new jersey!!!! woooohooo!! i heart them a ton!

such a busy weekend...

i went to jesse's from 3p-8:30p on sunday and then at 10pm the bus left for DC and we got there at like 5 am on monday...and we walked for a pro-life march from 8 am til 3:30pm and then we went to this place for dinner and the bus was gonna go get gas while we ate but he couldn't find anywhere that had diesel and the bus ran outta gas on this side of the road and our whole bus was stuck at the restaraunt til 10 and then we walked to a grocery store and we were there til 11:30pm and then the bus finally came and we didn't get home til 4:30 this morning..i got like 4 hrs. sleep on sunday nite and 2 hrs sleep last nite and then i had the math regents today, which wasn't that bad actually! only a couple i didn't understand =0...

well that's all for now..

JESSE <3 i heart you =* 



- jacksterrr
http://halfpipe-hottie.livejournal.com/8640.html

life is good.....


goin to Jesse's tomorrow for his b-day at 3p!! it was on the 20th...but the par-tay is tomorrow =P i heart him so much i think i've found someone that i can last w/....which is good b/c i really like him a lot..=) i can't wait to see him tomorrow!!! i think i'ma "puddle" myself =P ((haha lindsey!!))dude there is so much snow outside!!! i love it!! ski club is gonna rock this wednesday!!!tomorrow at 10p leavin for DC baby!!! goin from sunday niters-monday and then comin home around 2a on tuesday morning ugh...and then the math regents from 12p-3p...this is gonna be a long 3 days....but that's okay!! well that's all for now..i'll have to update when i get home from DC probably..write back lata..

=) jesse<3 -- i don't know what i'd do w/o you =* i heart you soooo much!<3



-Jacksterr
http://halfpipe-hottie.livejournal.com/8447.html

what a great day....

yay linds now we BOTH have boyfriends...and only 2 days apart..=P
there are so many coincidences lol talking in the regents practice lol!! you are so cute! after school i had an ortho appt. i love invisilign appts..only 5 minutes and i'm done =P. i only have about 11 more weeks w/ them and then i'm done!! yay! toniters i have confirmation from 6:45p - 8:30p...ugh..so boring...well i gotta go finish homework...write back lata..




this broken heart is mended...
i heart you jesse...<3


smooches,
Jackster

yay.....jesse asked me out tonite!!! i am so happy i've liked him for a while...=D  i'm goin to semi w/ him...feb. 5th is gonna be so crazy! we have bandfest from 12:30-5p and then semi is lata til midnite...wow that's gonna be one crazy day! but it will be so much fun! tomorrow i think i'm goin to the movies w/ kirstie..i heart her...that's all for now write back lata...





JESSE <3

we had so much fun!!! lol!! writin w/ the highliters and tryin to get my camera to work lol!! haha so many fun times guys i had a blast! 



can't WAIT til semi ... <3 it's gonna be so much fun!

well i was gonna go to Lab today (sunday)w/ mk but i gotta clean n stuff... so, oh well..maybe hittin the movies either today or monday...

well that's all for now..write back lata..


-jacksta =P
